Firstly, check the values.
Decrypt my super sick RSA:
c: 240986837130071017759137533082982207147971245672412893755780400885108149004760496
n: 831416828080417866340504968188990032810316193533653516022175784399720141076262857
e: 65537
We can determine that n is extremely small(81 bit), just as the hint.
So we can directly factor the n.
Use https://github.com/RsaCtfTool/RsaCtfTool is the best solution.(Quickly)
python3 ./RsaCtfTool/RsaCtfTool.py -n 831416828080417866340504968188990032810316193533653516022175784399720141076262857 -e 65537 --uncipher 240986837130071017759137533082982207147971245672412893755780400885108149004760496
Get the flag.
picoCTF{sma11_N_n0_g0od_23540368}
